channel.title: Short Fuse 2: Shorter Fuse [Misplays Galore] (Game Over: Mafia Wins)
channel.description:
# Short Fuse
## This could either go really well or really shit, but if last time is any to go by it should at least be entertaining
### Setup [color=green]11 Town[/color] [color=red]5 Mafia[/color]
Mafia requires parity to win rather than the total obliteration of the town faction
Nightless Mafia have a factional chat but do not have a factional kill Days are 48 hours long Lynches happen through either majority or plurality You cannot vote for a nolynch
### Game Gimmick Each player has a bomb strapped to them, the bombs can only be disarmed when 1 faction wins.
At the beginning of the game, each player is publicly given a detonator.
At any point, you may type **/detonate** in the game thread to kill the player whose detonator you hold.
When a player dies for any reason (detonation or lynch), the detonator they hold is given to the player who holds their detonator, so if A can kill B and B can kill C, if B dies, A then has the detonator to kill C.
A player may detonate a maximum of one player per day.
Before the game starts, the Mafia must tell me if they want a Town detonator, a Mafia detonator, or for it to be random. A maximum of 4 Mafia detonators can be taken.
Once the player who has your detonator types **/detonate**, you can no longer detonate anyone, this rule is just a safety net if someone is detonated when I am asleep.
## Changes from last game: 11:5 as opposed to 12:4, per popular demand I will send cards to Townies too
### Signups (A -> B = A can detonate B) 1. Alice - Detonated D1 (7) - [color=green]Town[/color] 2. Sam17z - Detonated D1 (4) - [color=green]Town[/color] 3. WazzaAzza - Detonated D2 (9) - [color=green]Town[/color] 4. Captain -> orangeandblack5 5. Margaret - Detonated D1 (3) - [color=red]Mafia[/color] 6. DatBird - Detonated D1 (1) - [color=green]Town[/color] 7. orangeandblack5 -> MaximusPrime 8. MaximusPrime -> H_Hjasik 9. Mercenary - Detonated D1 (5) - [color=green]Town[/color] 10. H_Hjasik -> Geyde 11. Solic - Lynched D1 (8) - [color=green]Town[/color] 12. bazingaboy - Detonated D2 (10) - [color=green]Town[/color] 13. Marluxion - Detonated D1 (6) - [color=green]Town[/color] 14. BlueStorm - Detonated D1 (2) - [color=red]Mafia[/color] 15. Geyde -> Meteoro 16. Meteoro -> Captain
![image|482x500](upload://tojiZGv5S0fXVLBfr6UWQXOEUgn.jpeg)
Backups 1. Blizer

item.description:

margaret: yolobombs town
some of y’all: “hmm idk if scum would really do this, i think we should wait”

Jazz:

marl: kills a mafia
y’all: “hmmm susp”

one of these on its own could be forgiven but the fact is that you instantly scumread the person who yolo’d scum and had to deliberate on whether the person who yolo’d town was scum or not is hilarious
